产品标题: Sermoon X1 Industrial-Grade 4-in-1 3D Scanner 0.02mm High Blue & NTR Markerless, Full-Color, Suitable for Engineering Manufacturing
要点说明:
High Accuracy with NIR Technology:Utilizes NIR technology for precise measurements, ensuring high-fidelity 3D models.
Anti-Shake Tracking System:Equipped with an anti-shake tracking system for stable, uninterrupted scanning.
Wide Scanning Range:Offers a 34+7+1 blue line scanning range for capturing large objects.
Easy Setup with Scan Bridge: Comes with a Scan Bridge for a simple setup, making 3D scanning accessible to all.
Portable and Lightweight Design:Designed for portability, the Sermoon S1 is lightweight for on-the-go scanning.

Color : Black
interface type : Usb
products status : Stock
software development kit (sdk) : Yes
